caption.p: Plcg2 in situ hybridization on brain tissue. A) RNAScope for PLCG2, positive (PPIB) and negative (DapB) controls in human cortex. B) RNAScope for Plcg2 in adult mouse brain (OB olfactory bulb, CA1 hippocampal area CA1, DG dentate gyrus, SNr substantia nigra pars reticulata). (PDF 2671 kb)
